title: Onboarding - Follow up on Abandoned Cart
description: An agent is tasked with calling a potential customer who started an online order but did not complete it.

tasks.description: Access the abandoned cart details from the web sales system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the items the customer had in their cart (e.g., iPhone, Unlimited Plan).

tasks.description: Call the customer, reference their saved cart, and ask if they have any questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a helpful, non-pushy follow-up call.

tasks.description: Answer the customer's questions and complete the order over the phone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully converts the abandoned cart into a sale.
